plot: The story of a hotel - on how, barely a year after it opened, it became the head office and the symbol of a revolution. About how a Norwegian-American hotel magnate from Klofta and Texas came to lose his Caribbean headquarters.
title: When Castro Seized the Hilton
plot_es: The story of a hotel - on how, barely a year after it opened, it became the head office and the symbol of a revolution. About how a Norwegian-American hotel magnate from Klofta and Texas came to lose his Caribbean headquarters.
